text: John Patrick Shanley (born October 13, 1950) is an American writer and movie director. He is a playwright and screenwriter. He won the Academy Award for Best Original Screenplay for Moonstruck (1987). In 2005, he won a Pulitzer Prize and Tony Award for his play Doubt: A Parable. He wrote and directed Doubt (2008), the movie based on his play. His other movies include Five Corners (1987), The January Man (1989), Joe Versus the Volcano (1990), Alive, We're Back! A Dinosaur's Story (both 1993) and Congo (1995). Shanley was born in the Bronx, New York City. He is of Irish background. He is married to Jayne Haynes.
